article.title: Northrop Grumman Wins VisIOn Information Operations Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Northrop Grumman Corporation has been awarded a task order valued at $4 million to develop the software architecture for the Virtual Integrated Support for Information Operations eNvironment (VisIOn) system, which will provide situational awareness and mission planning capabilities for information operations across all U.S. military commands.
